# Spells (Alphabetical List - T)
## Ta-Te
**Tactical Acumen:** You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

**[[Tactical Precision (Spell)|Tactical Precision]]****:** Allies gain additional +2 bonus on attack rolls and +1d6 additional damage against flanked foes.

**[[Tactical Teleportation (Spell)|Tactical Teleportation]]****:** Teleport one creature/3 levels a short distance.

**[[Tail Slap (Spell)|Tail Slap]]****:** Attack a foe for 1 round/level and knock him back on the first round.

**[[Tail Sweep (Spell)|Tail Sweep]]****:** Your tail of force can attack a group of foes within 10 ft.

**[[Talons (Spell)|Talons]]****:** Transform your hands into talon-like claws; giving you two natural claw attacks/round, 

     dealing 1d6 points of slashing damage (plus Str modifier).

**Targeted Bomb Admixture:** Empowers bombs you throw to deal more damage to a single creature.

**[[Targeting Ray (Spell)|Targeting Ray]]****:** You and allies are +1 to hit/3 levels against subject.

**[[Tattoo Potion (Spell)|Tattoo Potion]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Cause a potion to turn into a spell tattoo when it is drunk.

**[[Taunt Dragon (Spell)|Taunt Dragon]]****:** Dragon must attack you or take a penalty on attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws.

**[[Telekinesis]]****:** Moves object, attacks creature, or hurls object or creature.

**[[Telekinetic Sphere (Spell)|Telekinetic Sphere]]****:** As *[[Resilient Sphere (Spell)|resilient sphere]]*, but you move the sphere telekinetically.

**[[Telekinetic Volley (Spell)|Telekinetic Volley]]:** Touch a group of items, launching them as ranged attacks.

**[[Telepathic Bond (Spell)|Telepathic Bond]]****:** Link lets allies communicate.

**[[Telepathic Bond, Lesser (Spell)|Telepathic Bond, Lesser]]****:** Link with subject within 30 ft. for 10 minutes/level.

**[[Telepathy Block (Spell)|Telepathy Block]]****:** Blocks all telepathic communication within 80-ft. radius.

**[[Telepathy Tap (Spell)|Telepathy Tap]]****:** Overhear creatures’ telepathic communications.

**[[Teleport (Spell)|Teleport]]****:** Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles per level.

**[[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|Teleport, Greater]]****:** As *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]*, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.

**[[Teleport Cage (Spell)|Teleport Cage]]:** Modify the functioning of all conjuration (teleportation) spells and spell-like abilities, into, out of, and within its area.

**[[Teleport Lair (Spell)|Teleport Lair]]****:** Caster transfers portion of one location to another location.

**[[Teleport Object (Spell)|Teleport Object]]****:** As *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]*, but affects a touched object.

**[[Teleport Ship (Spell)|Teleport Ship]]****<u>:</u>** Teleport a ship and all its crew and cargo to a designated destination.

**[[Teleport Through Time (Spell)|Teleport Through Time]]** **<sup>M XP</sup>:** Instantly transports you and touched objects or other touched willing creatures to a different time.

**[[Teleport Trace, Greater (Spell)|Teleport Trace, Greater]]****:** Uncovers destination of teleport.

**[[Teleport Transfer (Spell)|Teleport Transfer]]****:** Incoming or outgoing teleport has a new destination.

**[[Teleport Trap (Spell)|Teleport Trap]]****:** Ward an area, redirecting all teleportation into or out of the area to a specific point 

     within the area determined by you at the time of casting.

**[[Teleportation Circle (Spell)|Teleportation Circle]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Teleports creatures inside circle.

**[[Temporal Aging (Spell)|Temporal Aging]]****:** Target suffers a  -4 penalty to any three attributes of your choice for the duration.

**[[Temporal Displacement (Spell)|Temporal Displacement]]****:** Push an item or creature 2d6 rounds into the future.

**[[Temporal Eye (Spell)|Temporal Eye]]** **<sup>M F</sup>:** You can scry people or places in another time.

**[[Temporal Fold (Spell)|Temporal Fold]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You bend and fold time, doubling your actions while risking damage each round.

**[[Temporal Stasis (Spell)|Temporal Stasis]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Puts subject into suspended animation.

**[[Temporal Vortex (Spell)|Temporal Vortex]]** **<sup>M XP</sup>:** Create a swirling vortex back through time for you and 1 creature/5 caster levels.

**[[Temporal Vortex, Greater (Spell)|Temporal Vortex, Greater]]** **<sup>M XP</sup>:** As *[[Temporal Vortex (Spell)|temporal vortex]]**,* but *vortex* may reach up to 100/level back in time.

**[[Temporary Resurrection (Spell)|Temporary Resurrection]]****:** Bring a creature to life for 24 hours, after which it dies again.

**[[Tenacious Dispelling (Spell)|Tenacious Dispelling]]****:** As targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, but second consecutive casting is more potent.

**[[Terra Cotta Lion (Spell)|Terra Cotta Lion]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Statuette becomes a Huge animated object which fights for you.

**[[Terra Cotta Warrior (Spell)|Terra Cotta Warrior]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Statuette becomes a Medium animated object which fights for you.

**[[Tern's Persistence (Spell)|Tern’s Persistence]]****:** Subject can travel overland 50% longer without fatigue.

**Terrible Remorse:** Creature is compelled to harm itself.

**[[Tetsubo of Earth (Spell)|Tetsubo of Earth]]****:** Melee attack deals 1d10+1/two levels damage.

## Tf-Tj
**[[Thalassemia (Spell)|Thalassemia]]****:** Turns blood to seawater, dealing 1d6/level damage.

**[[Thaw (Spell)|Thaw]]****:** Transforms one 10-ft. cube/level of everfrost, slush, snow, and ice.

**Thief Ward:** [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] and [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks are made at a –10 penalty.

**[[Thief Ward, Greater (Spell)|Thief Ward, Greater]]****:** [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] and [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks are made at a –20 penalty.

**[[Thin Air (Spell)|Thin Air]]****:** Creatures suffer from altitude sickness.

**[[Thorn Body (Spell)|Thorn Body]]****:** Those attacking you take 1d6 +1 damage/level.

**[[Thorn Javelin (Spell)|Thorn Javelin]]****:** Wield a [[Javelin|javelin]] that sickens opponents when it strikes.

**[[Thornskin (Spell)|Thornskin]]****:** Your unarmed attacks deal +1d6 damage; natural and unarmed attacks against you take 5 damage.

**[[Thorny Entanglement (Spell)|Thorny Entanglement]]****:** As *[[Entangle (Spell)|entangle]]*, plus plants make ranged attacks.

**[[Thousand Needles (Spell)|Thousand Needles]]****:** Subject takes 2d6 damage and –4 penalty on attacks, saves, and checks.

**[[Threefold Aspect (Spell)|Threefold Aspect]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Appear older or younger.

**[[Threesteel (Spell)|Threesteel]]****:** You create three duplicates of a weapon and launch them against foes.

**[[Threshold Barrier (Spell)|Threshold Barrier]]****:** You ward a door or portal with paralyzing magic.

**[[Thunder Field (Spell)|Thunder Field]]****:** Creatures in area take 1d8 sonic damage/round, knocked prone.

**Thunder Fire:** Ammunition in the targeted firearm deafens opponents.

**[[Thunderclap (Spell)|Thunderclap]]****:** Loud noise causes stunning, deafness, and knocks prone in a large area.

**[[Thunderhead (Spell)|Thunderhead]]****:** Small lightning bolts deal 1d6 damage/round.

**[[Thundering Drums (Spell)|Thundering Drums]]:** 1d8 damage/level and knocked [[Prone|prone]].

**[[Thunderlance (Spell)|Thunderlance]]****:** Lance of force deals 3d6 damage and might dispel force effects.

**[[Thunderous Roar (Spell)|Thunderous Roar]]****:** Roar deals 1d6 damage/2 levels, deafens.

**[[Thunderstomp (Spell)|Thunderstomp]]****:** Trip one creature within range.

**[[Thunderstomp, Greater (Spell)|Thunderstomp, Greater]]****:** Trip multiple creatures within range.

**[[Thunderstroke (Spell)|Thunderstroke]]****:** Call down a bolt of electricity, which unerringly strikes the target 

     and deals 1d6 points of electricity damage per caster level (maximum 5d6).

**[[Tidal Wave (Spell)|Tidal Wave]]****:** Massive wave damages boats, creatures, and structures on a coast.

**[[Tiger's Tooth (Spell)|Tiger’s Tooth]]****:** One natural weapon of subject gets +1/4 levels on attack rolls and damage rolls (max +5) for 1 round.

**[[Time Conduit (Spell)|Time Conduit]]****:** Create a portal backwards through time.

**[[Time Shudder (Spell)|Time Shudder]]****:** Nearby creatures are affected by *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]* or *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]* each round.

**[[Time Stop (Spell)|Time Stop]]****:** You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds. 

**[[Timely Inspiration (Spell)|Timely Inspiration]]****:** Gives bonus on failed check/attack.

**[[Tiny Hut (Spell)|Tiny Hut]]****:** Creates shelter for 10 creatures.

**[[Tiny Igloo (Spell)|Tiny Igloo]]****:** Creates igloo that lasts for 2 hours/level.

**[[Tireless (Spell)|Tireless]]****:** Target gains the stamina of a machine for 24 hrs.

**[[Tireless Pursuers (Spell)|Tireless Pursuers]]:** As *[[Tireless Pursuit (Spell)|tireless pursuit]]*, but affects multiple creatures.

**[[Tireless Pursuit (Spell)|Tireless Pursuit]]:** Ignore fatigue while hustling.

## Tk-To
**[[Toilsome Chant (Spell)|Toilsome Chant]] <sup>R</sup>:** Allow inspire competence to last for the duration of the skill affected.

**[[Tojanida Sight (Spell)|Tojanida Sight]]:** Gain [[S3.1A-C - Universal Monster Rules A-C (Bestiary 6 Apx)|all-around vision]].

**[[Tomb of Jade (Spell)|Tomb of Jade]]****:** Entraps and harms Shadowlands creatures.

**[[Tomb of Light (Spell)|Tomb of Light]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Entraps and harms evil extraplanar creatures.

**[[Tongue of Baalzebul (Spell)|Tongue of Baalzebul]]****:** Caster gains +2 bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] and [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks.

**[[Tongue Serpents (Spell)|Tongue Serpents]]****:** Caster spits out one Tiny viper/4 levels.

**[[Tongue Tendrils (Spell)|Tongue Tendrils]]****:** Caster spits out tendrils that [[Grapple|grapple]].

**[[Tongues (Spell)|Tongues]]****:** Speak and understand any language.

**Tongues, Communal:** As *[[Tongues (Spell)|tongues]]*, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

**[[Toothed Tentacle (Spell)|Toothed Tentacle]]****:** Shadowy tentacle ending in three mouths (each AC 15, hp 10 + your caster level) projects from your hand. 

     The mouths can strike foes within 10 feet of each other indepentently, dealing 2d6 points of damage each.

**[[Torc of the Pharaoh (Spell)|Torc of the Pharaoh]]****:** Grants +4 AC and 25% chance to negate criticals or avoid sneak attacks.

**[[Torc of the Pharaoh, Greater (Spell)|Torc of the Pharaoh, Greater]]****:** Grants +6 AC and 50% chance to negate criticals or avoid sneak attacks.

**[[Tormenting Thirst (Spell)|Tormenting Thirst]]****:** Subject is overwhelmed by thirst.

**[[Torrent of Tears (Spell)|Torrent of Tears]]****:** Subject is temporarily [[Blinded|blinded]] and emotionally distraught.

**[[Tortoise Shell (Spell)|Tortoise Shell]]****:** Creature gains +6 natural armor, +1/3 levels above 11th.

**[[Total Repair (Spell)|Total Repair]]****:** Repair 10 points/level of damage to a construct.

**Touch Injection:** You can deliver an infusion, elixir, poison, or potion as a touch attack.

**[[Touch of Adamantine (Spell)|Touch of Adamantine]]****:** Weapon gains the properties of an adamantine weapon.

**[[Touch of Chaos (Spell)|Touch of Chaos]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Touched target transforms into a mass of quivering flesh.

**[[Touch of Fatigue (Spell)|Touch of Fatigue]]****:** Touch attack fatigues target.

**[[Touch of Gracelessness (Spell)|Touch of Gracelessness]]:** Subject loses 1d6 + 1 Dex/two levels and is prone to falling down.

**[[Touch of Idiocy (Spell)|Touch of Idiocy]]****:** Subject takes 1d6 penalty to Int, Wis, and Cha.

**[[Touch of Jorasco (Spell)|Touch of Jorasco]]****:** Touch heals up to 2 hp/level divided among multiple targets.

**[[Touch of Juiblex (Spell)|Touch of Juiblex]]****:** Subject turns to green slime in 4 rounds.

**[[Touch of Restoration (Spell)|Touch of Restoration]]****:** Use part of your lay on hands ability to cure 1 point of ability damage.

**Touch of Slime:** Touch infests a target with green slime.

**[[Touch of the Blackened Soul (Spell)|Touch of the Blackened Soul]]** **<sup>A</sup>:** Spells gain the evil descriptor and deal extra damage to good creatures.

**[[Touch of the Gods (Spell)|Touch of the Gods]]****:** Your healing disciplines also transmit spells.

**[[Touch of the Graveborn (Spell)|Touch of the Graveborn]]****:** Melee touch attack deals 10d6 damage or controls undead creature.

**[[Touch of the Sea (Spell)|Touch of the Sea]]:** Swim speed becomes 30 ft.

**[[Touch of Vecna (Spell)|Touch of Vecna]]****:** Deal negative energy damage and paralysis with your touch.

**[[Touch of Years (Spell)|Touch of Years]]****:** Target loses 3 points of Str, Dex, and Con; second casting blinds and deafens.

**[[Touchstone Lightning (Spell)|Touchstone Lightning]]****:** Use your Planar Touchstone-granted higher-order abilities to fuel damaging rays.

**[[Toughen Construct (Spell)|Toughen Construct]]****:** Grants construct +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.

**[[Towering Oak (Spell)|Towering Oak]]****:** +10 bonus on [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks.

**[[Towering Thunderhead (Spell)|Towering Thunderhead]]****:** Clouds provide concealment, block ranged attacks, empower sonic or electricity spells.

**Toxic Gift:** Target suffers the effect of a poison in you.

**[[Toxic Weapon (Spell)|Toxic Weapon]]****:** Coats weapon with poison.

**[[Toxic Tongue (Spell)|Toxic Tongue]]****:** Generate small amount of poison that you can spit or place on a weapon.

## Tp-Tt
**[[Train Animal (Spell)|Train Animal]]****:** Affected animal gains additional tricks equal to 1/2 caster level for 1 hour/level.

**[[Trait Removal (Spell)|Trait Removal]]****:** Temporarily remove one extraordinary or supernatural ability of your choice from the target creature.

**[[Trance (Spell)|Trance]]****:** Meditate to learn about nearby spirits.

**[[Trance of the Verdant Domain (Spell)|Trance of the Verdant Domain]]****:** Fascinate a single foe for 3 rounds, and make target vulnerable to your mind-affecting abilities.

**[[Transcend Mortality (Spell)|Transcend Mortality]]****:** You are nigh-unkillable for a brief period, but die immediately afterward.

**[[Transcribe Symbol (Spell)|Transcribe Symbol]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Safely moves an untriggered magical symbol to another location.

**[[Transfer Tattoo (Spell)|Transfer Tattoo]]:** Transfer a magical tattoo from one creature to another.

**[[Transference (Spell)|Transference]] <sup>F</sup>:** Transfers XP from a creature to create an agreed upon magic item.

**Transferred Learning:** Transfer skill ranks or a single feat temporarily from one target to another.

**[[Transferred Learning, Greater (Spell)|Transferred Learning, Greater]]****:** Transfer skill ranks or a single feat from one target to another for 1 day/level.

**[[Transfix (Spell)|Transfix]]****:** Humanoids freeze in place until condition you specify is met.

**[[Transformation (Spell)|Transformation]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You gain combat bonuses.

**[[Transformation of the Deeps (Spell)|Transformation of the Deeps]]****:** Grant water breathing, darkvision, and pressure immunity to one creature/3 levels.

**[[Translocation Trick (Spell)|Translocation Trick]]****:** You and subject switch places and appear as each other.

**[[Transmogrify (Spell)|Transmogrify]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Change your eidolon's evolutions.

**[[Transmute Coinage to Gem (Spell)|Transmute Coinage to Gem]]****:** Convert a stack of coins (of the same metallic type) into a gemstone.

**[[Transmute Metal to Wood (Spell)|Transmute Metal to Wood]]****:** Metal within 40 ft. becomes wood.

**[[Transmute Mud to Rock (Spell)|Transmute Mud to Rock]]****:** Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

**[[Transmute Potion to Poison (Spell)|Transmute Potion to Poison]]****:** Spit poison onto weapon after drinking potion.

**[[Transmute Rock to Lava (Spell)|Transmute Rock to Lava]]****:** Transforms one 10-ft. cube with subsequent fire damage and effects.

**[[Transmute Rock to Mud (Spell)|Transmute Rock to Mud]]****:** Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

**[[Transmute Rock to Sickstone]]****:** Transforms normal stone temporarily into deadly *sickstone* and magnify its dangerous properties.

**[[Transmute Sand to Glass (Spell)|Transmute Sand to Glass]]****:** Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

**[[Transmute Sand to Stone (Spell)|Transmute Sand to Stone]]****:** Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

**[[Transmute Stone to Sand (Spell)|Transmute Stone to Sand]]****:** Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

**[[Transport via Plants (Spell)|Transport via Plants]]****:** Move instantly from one plant to another of the same kind.

**[[Trap the Soul (Spell)|Trap the Soul]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Imprisons subject within gem.

**[[Traveler's Mount (Spell)|Traveler’s Mount]]****:** Creature moves faster but can’t attack.

**[[Treacherous Teleport (Spell)|Treacherous Teleport]]****:** As *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]*, except you choose some creatures to suffer a mishap or go elsewhere.

**[[Treacherous Weapon (Spell)|Treacherous Weapon]]****:** Target’s manufactured weapon takes a penalty for 1 round.

**[[Treasure Disk (Spell)|Treasure Disk]]****:** Moves large treasure hoards quickly, as with *[[Floating Disk (Spell)|floating disk]]*.

**[[Treasure Scent, Greater (Spell)|Treasure Scent, Greater]]****:** You detect valuable metals and gems.

**[[Treasure Stitching (Spell)|Treasure Stitching]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Objects on cloth become embroidered.

**[[Tree Shape (Spell)|Tree Shape]]****:** You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.

**[[Tree Stride (Spell)|Tree Stride]]****:** Step from one tree to another far away.

**[[Tremor (Spell)|Tremor]]****:** Subjects knocked [[Prone|prone]].

**[[S3.1T-Z - Universal Monster Rules T-Z (Bestiary 6 Apx)|Tremorsense]]****:** Grants tremorsense to a range of 30 feet.

**[[Triadspell (Spell)|Triadspell]]****:** Cast a prepared spell three times.

**[[Triggered Suggestion (Spell)|Triggered Suggestion]]****:** As *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*, but triggered only and target doesn’t remember the suggestion.

**[[Trip Vine (Spell)|Trip Vine]]****:** Plants trip creatures entering area.

**[[Triple Strike (Spell)|Triple Strike]]****:** Grants each subject two extra attacks with a held melee weapon at its highest base attack bonus; 

     grants the *[[Keen (MagWpnSpcAb)|keen]]* weapons held.

**[[Tripping Hand (Spell)|Tripping Hand]]****:** Hand trips subject.

**[[Trollshape (Spell)|Trollshape]]****: Y**ou take on the form and abilities of a troll.

**[[Troll's Form (Spell)|Troll’s Form]]****:** You take the form of a troll.

**[[True Casting (Spell)|True Casting]]****:** +10 on your next spell penetration roll.

**[[True Creation (Spell)|True Creation]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** As *[[Major Creation (Spell)|major creation]]*, but permanent.

**[[True Domination (Spell)|True Domination]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]**,* but save at –4.

**[[True Form (Spell)|True Form]]****:** Removes polymorph effects.

**[[True Oneness (Spell)|True Oneness]]****:** Allies share saving throw and abillity score modifiers; caster also may use skills.

**[[True Light (Spell)|True Light]]****:** As *[[Light Spells|light]]**,* but also functions as the *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]* spell.

**[[True Resurrection (Spell)|True Resurrection]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Resurrection (Spell)|resurrection]]*, plus remains aren’t needed.

**[[True Seeing (Spell)|True Seeing]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Lets you see all things as they really are.

**[[True Seeing, Mass (Spell)|True Seeing, Mass]]****:** As *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*, but affects multiple creatures.

**[[True Skill (Spell)|True Skill]]****:** Gain an insight bonus on the check equal to 1/2 your caster level the next time you attempt a skill check.

**[[True Strike (Spell)|True Strike]]****:** +20 on your next attack roll.

**[[True Telekinesis (Spell)|True Telekinesis]]****:** You mentally move object or creature up to 1,000 lbs./caster level.

**[[Trusted Bloodhound (Spell)|Trusted Bloodhound]]****:** Create a ferocious hound that tracks and attacks foes.

**[[Truthtelling (Spell)|Truthtelling]]****:** As *[[Zone of Truth (Spell)|zone of truth]]*, except affects a single creature touched.

**[[Tsunami (Spell)|Tsunami]]****:** Huge wave damages and sweeps up all in its path.

## Tu-Tz
**[[Tunnel Swallow (Spell)|Tunnel Swallow]]****:** Tunnel’s peristaltic convulsions deal 1d6 points of damage/level (max 15d6).

**[[Turbidity (Spell)|Turbidity]]****:** Water surrounding you becomes cloudy, granting concealment.

**[[Turn Anathema (Spell)|Turn Anathema]]****:** Use your turn/rebuke ability to turn creatures with the opposing alignment subtype.

**[[Twilight Haze (Spell)|Twilight Haze]]****:** Illusory fog obscures vision.

**[[Twilight Knife (Spell)|Twilight Knife]]:** Floating knife attacks with you.

**[[Twilight Luck (Spell)|Twilight Luck]]****:** Target gains +1 luck bonus on all saving throws.

**[[Twin Form (Spell)|Twin Form]]:** Creates controllable duplicate of you.

**[[Two Minds (Spell)|Two Minds]]:** Doubles the caster's mental actions.

**[[Tyche's Touch (Spell)|Tyche's Touch]]****:** Confers a decreasing sacred bonus or penalty on the subject's next four saving throws.
